taskbody.prereq: The following steps assume that you have a domain model file in your project.
taskbody.context: The Domain editor is the only supported way for creating and editing rules. DS Navigator provides an overview of existing rules in the project under Rules folder. Creating a new rule from this view is not allowed. Even if possible, it is strongly recommended that you do not copy an existing rule from the DS Navigator view.

step.cmd: Ensure that the rules are enabled.
In the DS Navigator view pane, double-click the domain model file that you want to work with.
step.stepresult: The file and its elements are displayed in the Editor area.

step.cmd: In the Editor area, right-click a dataset or a class, and select Rules Validation New .

step.info: For more information about how to edit the rule, access the Visual Rules documentation (see section ) or see section Rule Designer tutorials.

step.cmd: When you are finished editing the rule, close the System file in the Editor area.
